inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Service Connection (location of Blueprint)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure service connection for the Blueprints task. This can be an Azure Management Group or Subscription.

inputs.name: BlueprintVersion
inputs.label: Blueprint Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Blueprint version. If this value is equal to latest, the latest published version will be used.

inputs.name: ParametersFile
inputs.label: Assignment File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: A JSON file containing the assignment details and parameter values.

inputs.name: AlternateSubscription
inputs.label: Provide Subscription ID (requires Management Group scope)
inputs.helpMarkDown: When using a Service Connection that is scoped to a management group, specify the child subscription for the Blueprint assignment.

inputs.name: SubscriptionID
inputs.label: Subscription Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: When using a Service Connection that is scoped to a management group, specify the child subscription for the Blueprint assignment.

inputs.name: Wait
inputs.label: Wait for assignment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Wait for assignment to complete before moving to the next task.

inputs.name: Timeout
inputs.label: Time in seconds before wait timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Time in seconds before wait timeout.

inputs.name: StopOnFailure
inputs.label: Stop on Failure
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to fail the build when an assignment failure occours.
